title: Cambridge Technology Enterprises Extends Relationship with Schneider Electric
text: Cambridge Technology Enterprises Extends Relationship with Schneider Electric Industry leaders joining together to bring cloud capabilities to energy and sustainability management. LOUISVILLE, KY, September 17,   Cambridge Technology Enterprises, an IT services leader focused on the convergence of big data and cloud, announced its continued engagement with Schneider Electric, a global leader in energy and sustainability management with the goal of helping support their cloud application development, data modeling, and analytic reporting initiatives. The relationship between Cambridge Technology Enterprises and Schneider Electric dates back to 2003. Throughout this period of association, CTE has helped execute several successful projects for Schneider Electric from both the United States and India. "Our work with Schneider Electric has evolved our application development services capabilities," said Aashish Kalra, Chairman of Cambridge Technology Enterprises. "In continuation of our existing engagement with Schneider Electric, we look forward to expanding our services in cloud and big data domain." CTE has additionally leveraged its expertise in QC Automation and Application Performance Monitoring to assist Schneider Electric in providing its customers with best-in-class quality energy management solutions. "Throughout our relationship with CTE, they've grown their domain expertise, said Jessica Kipper, Director of Product Management at Schneider Electric. "They work to understand our business, business drivers, and are very flexible as our needs change." About Schneider Electric: As a global specialist in energy management and automation with operations in more than 100 countries, Schneider Electric offers integrated solutions across multiple market segments, including leadership positions in Non-residential & Residential Buildings, Industries & Machines Manufacturers, Utilities & Infrastructure and Data Centers & Networks. Focused on making energy safe, reliable, efficient, productive and green, the Group's 170,000 employees achieved revenues of 25 billion euros in 2014, through an active commitment to help individuals and organizations make the most of their energy. Please visit http://www.schneider-electric.com for more information. About Cambridge Technology Enterprises: Cambridge Technology Enterprises (CTE) is an IT services leader focused on the convergence of big data and cloud. Recognized as a thought leader and innovator of enterprise solutions, CTE focuses on cloud application development and management, data warehousing, business intelligence (BI) and analytics on the cloud. Through designing and implementing enterprise IT strategies that leverage the cloud's capabilities, CTE's end-to-end services enable its customers to harness the data available to them. Its expertise across domains makes CTE a preferred choice for IT Strategy and Implementation to its customers. For more information, visit http://www.ctepl.com or follow @CTEofficial on Twitter.
